title: China Chip Stocks Test Trader Patience With Soaring Valuations
description: China’s chip stocks have staged a world-beating rally in the past few months on the nation’s self-sufficiency push, but some investors are beginning to balk at their lofty valuations.

title: Samsung Shares on Course for Record High on AI, Chip Optimism
description: Samsung Electronics Co. shares jumped, on track to close at an all-time high, riding investor enthusiasm for its potential in artificial intelligence chips and renewed confidence in its conventional memory business.

title: TSMC and Samsung Offer Clues to Global AI Boom
description: The global AI boom is putting a spotlight on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s and Samsung Electronics Co.’s earnings outlook next week.
